Premises Planning & System Design 2

These modules develop advanced competencies in the field of premises design and layout engineering, with a core focus on 3D layout and ergonomic design. They will discover how to design furniture in 3D and prepare fitted layout to offer rendering of setup. The module is also providing the latest standards and recommendation to design ergonomic and safe working environment for all division of a hotel

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Create 3D basic furniture and equipment.

+  Prepare 3D fitted layout for kitchen and F&B area.

+  List core ergonomic rules for working space design in hospitality.

+  Recommend design feature for easy maintenance of furniture or equipment.
